title: How to Make an Amazing Crazy Cake

steps.headline: Put 1/2 cup flour, 1/4 cup sugar, the 1 tablespoon (14.8 ml) cocoa powder, 3/4 teaspoon baking powder, and 1/4 teaspoon salt in the medium mixing bowl.
steps.description: Use the wooden spoon to stir until well mixed.

steps.headline: Add 1/4 cup milk, 2 tablespoons (29.6 ml) oil, and 1 teaspoon vanilla.
steps.description: Stir with the wooden spoon until smooth. Pour batter into the un-greased casserole.

steps.headline: Put the 1/2 cup sugar and the 2 tablespoons (29.6 ml) cocoa powder in the small mixing bowl.
steps.description: Gradually stir in the boiling water.

steps.headline: Pour evenly over batter in casserole.
Put the casserole in the oven.
steps.description: Bake about 30 minutes or until a wooden toothpick comes out clean. (To test for doneness, use hot pads to pull out oven rack. Stick a toothpick in the center of the cake; pullout toothpick if any cake sticks to it, bake the cake for a few more minutes more and test it again.)

steps.headline: Turn off oven.
steps.description: Use the hot pads to remove the casserole from the oven, Set the casserole on the cooling rack for 20 to 30 minutes. Serve with whipped cream, if you like.

text: Preheat an oven to 350°F (180°C).  Put 1/2 cup flour, 1/4 cup sugar, the 1 tablespoon (14.8 ml) cocoa powder, 3/4 teaspoon baking powder, and 1/4 teaspoon salt in the medium mixing bowl. Use the wooden spoon to stir until well mixed. Add 1/4 cup milk, 2 tablespoons (29.6 ml) oil, and 1 teaspoon vanilla. Stir with the wooden spoon until smooth. Pour batter into the un-greased casserole. Put the 1/2 cup sugar and the 2 tablespoons (29.6 ml) cocoa powder in the small mixing bowl. Gradually stir in the boiling water. Pour evenly over batter in casserole.  Put the casserole in the oven. Bake about 30 minutes or until a wooden toothpick comes out clean. (To test for doneness, use hot pads to pull out oven rack. Stick a toothpick in the center of the cake; pullout toothpick if any cake sticks to it, bake the cake for a few more minutes more and test it again.) Turn off oven. Use the hot pads to remove the casserole from the oven, Set the casserole on the cooling rack for 20 to 30 minutes. Serve with whipped cream, if you like. Finished.
